DigestManager.summary: Utility Class that provides base methods to get hash digests.

GenerateFromString.summary: Static method to get a digest from an input string. It uses SHA 512.
GenerateFromString.returns: The hash of the input string, obtained using SHA 512.

DigestList.summary: Static method to get a create a Digest composing two different string, so that the digest can be computated if one has the two strings components
DigestList.returns: The hash of the obtained composing the two input strings, obtained using SHA 512
